# Load Raw Data

Load libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

Load raw data

```{r}
dir_create(path = "../_raw/")

url <- "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/download/?acc=GSE52778&format=file&file=GSE52778%5FAll%5FSample%5FFPKM%5FMatrix%2Etxt%2Egz"

destination <- "../_raw/GSE52778.txt.gz"

download.file(url, destination)
```

Save the loaded data as csv

```{r}
data <- read_delim("../_raw/GSE52778.txt.gz",delim = " ",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
dir_create(path = "../data/")
write_csv(x = data,file = "../data/GSE52778.csv")
```
